channel.title: No one can connect?
channel.description:
First off, yes I did make this account to ask this question so call me a "noob" if you must.
Now getting right on with it. My problem is that I change the no-ip from all the .java folders and still can't get anyone on my server. The main screen starts for them but it say error connecting to server.
[EDIT] Sorry, yea its a 317.
Things I have done:
[ol][li]Set up a no-ip account and have made a host.[/li] [li]Port forwarded.(I think ill give screenies)[/li] [li]Allowed it through my firewall.[/li] [li]Changed all of the no-ips in the client and in the source.[/li] [li]Downloaded no-ip.[/li] [li]Run the server.[/li] [li]Run no-ip[/li] [li]I can connect and none of my mates can.[/li][/ol]
Screenies of my port forwards:
[URL=http://img6.imageshack.us/i/port1v.jpg/][IMG]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/3286/port1v.jpg[/img][/URL]
Do I need to do this? Have I done it wrong?
[URL=http://img541.imageshack.us/i/port2j.jpg/][IMG]http://img541.imageshack.us/img541/8010/port2j.jpg[/img][/URL]
Any help is appreciated and if you need any more info just ask for it. Thanks in advanced :).

item.title: No one can connect?
item.dc:creator: @tbagu2 tbagu2
item.description:
@tbagu2 wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:9, topic:362026”][quote author=tbagu2 link=topic=458303.msg3353760#msg3353760 date=1285594747]

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=458303.msg3353759#msg3353759 date=1285594414]

deob?
[/quote]why in the world would that matter?

download this bad boy right hurr: http://portforward.com/help/portcheck.htm

run it, if its reachable you should be ready to go. if not. ill try to help you.

Hey I was at my grandmothers house when I was doing this, but now I am back at my house… So could I add you on msn and in about 3 days when I go back to my grandmothers house we can we discuss this issue?
[/quote]yea add me my msn is mackenzie1915@hotmail.com[/quote]

OK I have added you. my msn is jj281094@hotmail.com just so you don’t think its spam

[EDIT]
[EDIT]

Ok I am back at grans house but I haven’t seen you on msn Chaos. I have a new source and have changed all of the IP’s/Ports but still nothing. I have teamview if that helps anyone.Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: No one can connect?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Mr. Bobby:

deob?

Deob is short for deobfuscation, and has nothing to do with the client version… (Nor would it have anything to do with port forwarding )
